author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

Refactored code to allow EcalTrigPrimProducer to be able to call esConsumes for all EventSetup data products it needs.
Major change involved removing EventSetup access from the various helper classes, although several didn't use it at all.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles.
title: Add esConsumes to EcalTrigPrimProducer
